required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Important Data on COVID-19 Profile in Africa
clinical_study.official_title: Important Data on COVID-19 Profile in Africa

lead_sponsor.agency: Centre de Recherche Médicale de Lambaréné

collaborator.agency: European and Developing Countries Clinical Trials Partnership (EDCTP)
Institut de recherche en santé de surveillance épidémiologique et de formation
Université des Sciences de la Santé

clinical_study.source: Centre de Recherche Médicale de Lambaréné

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to Understand the natural history of Coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) infection to better define the period of infectiousness and transmissibility and to establish biobanks of COVID-19 blood and mucosal samples.

detailed_description.textblock:
In this study ,the participants will be enrolled sequentially in the COVID-19 care referral centers. The infected hospitalized patient will be identified by the physicians in hospital. After the patient has given his/her informed consent the permission will be sought from him to approach his household contacts. The household contacts will be screened, and included in the study.
Patients hospitalized and positive for COVID-19 by PCR and their household contacts of all ages and gender (40% minimum of female), will be enrolled upon receipt of written informed consent.

primary_outcome.measure: clinical and biological parameters of COVID-19
primary_outcome.description: Infection and disease progression - Pattern of virus transmission
proportion of household contact who will become positive for SARS-COV2 using PCR

arm_group.description: Patients infected by SARS-Cov2 Polymerase Chain Reaction (PCR) and hospitalized in a referral center for COVID-19 .
Household contacts of SARS-Cov2 hospitalized COVID-19 patients.

study_pop.textblock: The study population will consist of volunteer COVID-19 patients hospitalized in referral center for COVID-19 care as well as the household contacts of these hospitalized COVID-19 patients in Gabon, Senegal and Ethiopia.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Molecular (PCR) confirmed COVID-19 patients hospitalized in referral centers,
- Household contacts of hospitalized COVID-19 patient,
- Provided signed informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnancy

overall_official.affiliation: Centre de Recherches Médicales de Lambaréné

facility.name: Centre de Recherches Médicales de Lammbaréné
Centre de Recherches Médicales de Lambréné

patient_data.ipd_description: Results from our COVID-19 AFRICA, AIDCO, project will be published in peer reviewed journals, seeking rapid and open access publication. This will be done as fast and widely as possible. Results will also be submitted and presented in any national, regional and international scientific meetings and congresses dedicated to COVID-19 online or face to face if, permitted. Before submission for publication or presentation, the review process outlined in the Consortium Agreement and agreed upon by all partners will be followed and care will be taken with respect to intellectual property protection.
